message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the initial price of $15000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12500.
